TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed RemotingServices extends System.Object
public ref class RemotingServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供多种使用和发布远程对象及代理的方法。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects and proxies.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非您是问题，如激活、 生存期管理或事务处理的服务提供商，你不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Unless you are a service provider dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, or transactions, you do not need to distinguish between proxy references and object references. 远程处理基础结构使用给出的远程对象驻留在客户端的空间的印象的透明代理。The remoting infrastructure uses transparent proxies that give the impression that the remote objects reside in the client's space. 代理服务器来实现此调用在远程位置的实际对象对其进行转发。Proxies achieve this by forwarding calls made on them to the real objects at remote locations.

summary.span: 为已知对象创建一个代理。

span.span: Creates a proxy for a well-known object.

param.name: classToProxy

span.span: The of a well-known object on the server end to which you want to connect.

span.span: The URL of the server class.

summary.span: 使用给定的 和 URL，为已知对象创建一个代理。

span.span: Creates a proxy for a well-known object, given the and URL.

returns.span: 远程对象的代理，指向由指定的已知对象提供的终结点。

span.span: A proxy to the remote object that points to an endpoint served by the specified well-known object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的代理对象指向由指定的已知对象服务的终结点。The returned proxy object points to an endpoint served by the specified well-known object. 对此代理调用方法之前通过网络不发送任何消息。No messages are sent over the network until a method is called on the proxy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建的已知对象的代理。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a proxy to a well-known object. param.span: 一个代理，连接到要为其创建 的对象。

span.span: A proxy connected to the object you want to create a for.

summary.span: 从指定的代理返回表示远程对象的 。

span.span: Returns the that represents the remote object from the specified proxy.

returns.span: ，它表示指定的代理要连接到的远程对象；或者如果对象或代理未被封送，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the remote object the specified proxy is connected to, or if the object or proxy have not been marshaled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消封送，进行分析，以提取远程对象和透明的代理的方法信息和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. A包含描述信息正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何访问远程应用程序的信息和位置对象所在。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remote application where the object is located. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取指定对象的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to get a instance for the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/VB/client.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy GetRealProxy (object proxy);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy GetRealProxy(object proxy) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetRealProxy (proxy As Object) As RealProxy
public: static System::Runtime::Remoting::Proxies::RealProxy ^ GetRealProxy(System::Object ^ proxy);

param.name: proxy
param.span: 透明代理。

span.span: A transparent proxy.

summary.span: 返回指定透明代理后面的真实代理。

span.span: Returns the real proxy backing the specified transparent proxy.

returns.span: 透明代理后面的真实代理实例。

span.span: The real proxy instance backing the transparent proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象在任何类型的远程边界之间的客户端实际的对象使用透明的代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理使效果实际对象驻留在客户端的空间。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它从而实现此目的转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其进行调用。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 由类型的托管的运行时类的实例支持透明代理。The transparent proxy is backed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承关联的托管对象，如垃圾收集、 成员和方法，支持语义，可以扩展以形成新类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 代理充当远程对象 （透明代理），与相同的类的对象，并且也是托管的对象。The proxy acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and is also a managed object.

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

permission.span: 要求值： ;权限值：

span.span: Demand value: ; Permission value:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 远程处理使用标识终结点 Uri 时，因为方法是在使用远程处理基础结构 （例如，信道接收器、 动态接收器和上下文接收器） 的可插入部分中非常有用对象，因为当前方法将返回的 URI 中的关联的类型对象。Because remoting identifies endpoints using URIs, the method is very useful in the pluggable parts of the remoting infrastructure (for example, channel sinks, dynamic sinks, and context sinks) that use objects, because the current method will return the associated type object from the URI. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CPP/remotingservicessample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CS/remotingservicessample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/VB/remotingservicessample.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的会话 ID 可能返回的对象在同一应用程序，但此方法将永远不会返回不同的远程应用程序中的两个对象相同的会话 ID。The same session ID might be returned for objects in the same application, but this method will never return the same session ID for two objects in different remote applications. 有关会话和会话 Id 标识的详细信息，请参阅 ASP.Net [ASP.NET 会话状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For more information about identifying sessions and session IDs, see ASP.Net [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前会话的会话 ID 字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to get the session ID string for the current session. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关应用程序域的信息，请参阅[应用程序域](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/39e57d07-a740-4cd4-ae82-e119ea3856c1)。For information about application domains, see [Application Domains](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/39e57d07-a740-4cd4-ae82-e119ea3856c1). ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/VB/class1.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function IsObjectOutOfContext (tp As Object) As Boolean

param.name: tp
param.span: 要检查的对象。

span.span: The object to check.

summary.span: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示给定代理表示的对象是否包含在与调用当前方法的对象不同的上下文中。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the object represented by the given proxy is contained in a different context than the object that called the current method.

returns.span: 如果该对象在当前上下文之外，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object is out of the current context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文是定义的环境可用于驻留在其中的对象的属性的有序。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects that reside inside it. 在配置为要求某些自动服务，此类同步、 事务、 中实时激活、 安全性和等等的对象的激活过程会创建上下文。Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。Multiple objects can live inside a context. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/VB/class1.vb#1)]

.method public static hidebysig bool IsOneWay(class System.Reflection.MethodBase method) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsOneWay (method As MethodBase) As Boolean
public: static bool IsOneWay(System::Reflection::MethodBase ^ method);

param.name: method
param.span: 上述方法。

span.span: The method in question.

summary.span: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示调用给定消息中指定的方法的客户端在继续执行之前是否等待服务器完成该方法的处理。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the client that called the method specified in the given message is waiting for the server to finish processing the method before continuing execution.

returns.span: 如果该方法是单向的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method is one way; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用单向方法时，客户端不会等待服务器以完成处理消息。When a one-way method is called, the client does not wait for the server to finish processing the message. 在客户端方法返回的应用程序不知道服务器将成功处理该消息。The client method returns to the application with no knowledge of whether or not the server will successfully process the message. 方法被标记为一种方法使用。Methods are marked as one way using the . 单向方法不能有返回值或任何 out 参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CPP/remotingservicessample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CS/remotingservicessample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/VB/remotingservicessample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsTransparentProxy (object proxy);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsTransparentProxy(object proxy) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsTransparentProxy (proxy As Object) As Boolean
public: static bool IsTransparentProxy(System::Object ^ proxy);

param.name: proxy
param.span: 对要检查的对象的引用。

span.span: The reference to the object to check.

summary.span: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示给定的对象是透明代理还是实际对象。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the given object is a transparent proxy or a real object.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示 参数中指定的对象是透明代理还是实际对象。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object specified in the parameter is a transparent proxy or a real object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象在任何类型的远程边界之间的客户端实际的对象使用透明的代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理使效果实际对象驻留在客户端的空间。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它从而实现此目的转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其进行调用。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理是托管的运行时类的类型实例本身。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承关联的托管对象，如垃圾收集、 成员和方法，支持语义，可以扩展以形成新类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 因此，该代理具有双重特性;一方面它需要充当远程对象 （透明代理），与相同的类的对象，并且在其他它是托管的对象本身。Thus the proxy has a dual nature; on the one hand it needs to act as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and on the other it is a managed object itself. 代理对象可在不考虑。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 应用程序不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 但是，处理问题，如激活的服务提供商，生命期管理和事务需要进行这种区分。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来确定对象的代理或真实对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to determine whether an object is a proxy or a real object. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅示例类。For the complete example code, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CPP/ad.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CS/ad.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/VB/ad.vb#6)]

span.span: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.

span.span: Converts the given into an instance of the class, which can be serialized for transmission between application domains and over a network.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef Marshal (MarshalByRefObject Obj);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef Marshal(class System.MarshalByRefObject Obj) cil managed
Public Shared Function Marshal (Obj As MarshalByRefObject) As ObjRef
public: static System::Runtime::Remoting::ObjRef ^ Marshal(MarshalByRefObject ^ Obj);

param.name: Obj
param.span: 要转换的对象。

span.span: The object to convert.

summary.span: 接受 ，将其注册到远程处理基础结构，然后将其转换为 类的实例。

span.span: Takes a , registers it with the remoting infrastructure, and converts it into an instance of the class.

returns.span: 类的一个实例，它表示 参数中指定的对象。

span.span: An instance of the class that represents the object specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. A包含描述信息和正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达的远程处理分支的信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，但不是用上下文，处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 如果未显式设置一个 URI方法，由远程处理标识基础结构自动生成。If a URI was not explicitly set by the method, it is automatically generated by the remoting identity infrastructure. 无法将一个 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象的服务器端生成了 URI 或该对象是众所周知的 URI 在此情况下为已知。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 因此，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 自定义代理的此限制是很宽松，因为透明代理将被视为该服务器对象。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

exception.span: 参数是一个对象代理。

span.span: The parameter is an object proxy.

exception.span: 在调用堆栈上部，至少有一个调用方没有配置远程处理类型和通道的权限。

span.span: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.

permission.span: 有关远程处理基础结构的配置。

span.span: for configuration of the remoting infrastructure.

permission.span: 要求值： ;权限值：

span.span: Demand value: ; Permission value:

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. A包含描述信息和正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达的远程处理分支的信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，但不是用上下文，处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 无法将一个 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象的服务器端生成了 URI 或该对象是众所周知的 URI 在此情况下为已知。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 因此，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 自定义代理的此限制是很宽松，因为透明代理将被视为该服务器对象。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用当前方法进行封送处理指定的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the current method to marshal a specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CPP/manualserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CS/manualserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/VB/manualserver.vb#2)]

span.span: An instance of the class that represents the object specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. A包含描述信息和正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达的远程处理分支的信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 指定远程处理基础结构用于限制公开的类型层次结构的作用域。The specified is used by the remoting infrastructure to limit the scope of the exposed type hierarchy. 例如，如果对象 A 派生自对象 B，后者派生自对象 C，和调用，则客户端可以强制转换代理 C 和 B 之间但不是到 a。For example, if object A derives from object B, which derives from object C, and is called, then the client can cast the proxy between C and B but not to A. 在封送处理，使用从当前线程的上下文，但不是用上下文，处于活动状态时创建对象时。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 无法将一个 URI 与代理关联的两个原因之一： 在它表示的对象的服务器端生成了 URI 或该对象是众所周知的 URI 在此情况下为已知。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 因此，如果`Obj`参数是一个代理，将引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 自定义代理的此限制是很宽松，因为透明代理将被视为该服务器对象。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetObjectUriForMarshal (MarshalByRefObject obj, string uri);
.method public static hidebysig void SetObjectUriForMarshal(class System.MarshalByRefObject obj, string uri) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetObjectUriForMarshal (obj As MarshalByRefObject, uri As String)
public: static void SetObjectUriForMarshal(MarshalByRefObject ^ obj, System::String ^ uri);

param.name: obj
param.span: 为其设置 URI 的对象。

span.span: The object to set a URI for.

param.name: uri
param.span: 要分配给指定对象的 URI。

span.span: The URI to assign to the specified object.

summary.span: 为后续的 方法调用设置 URI。

span.span: Sets the URI for the subsequent call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封送处理给定的对象时，使用设置当前方法的 URI。The URI set by the current method is used when marshaling the given object. 封送后，指定的对象的 URI 设置中的字符串为`uri`参数追加到的当前。After marshaling, the URI of the specified object is set to the string in the `uri` parameter appended onto the of the current . 如果当前应用程序正在侦听的 HTTP 端口，则这两个字符串中指定`uri`参数和`uri`字符串追加到的当前路由到指定的对象。If the current application is listening on an HTTP port, then both the string specified in the `uri` parameter and the `uri` string appended onto the of the current route to the specified object. 示例中，如果应用程序正在侦听 HTTP 端口 9000，则同时http://localhost:9000/objectUri，和http://localhost:9000/ \ / objectUri 路由到对象中指定`obj`参数。For example, if the application is listening on HTTP port 9000, then both http://localhost:9000/objectUri, and http://localhost:9000/\/objectUri route to the object specified in the `obj` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置将使用的 URI方法指定的对象封送处理时。The following code example demonstrates how to set the URI that will be used by the method when marshaling the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消封送，进行分析，以提取远程对象和透明的代理的方法信息和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 已分析的内容之前向公共语言运行时注册透明代理添加到透明的代理。The content of the parsed is added to the transparent proxy before the transparent proxy is registered with the common language runtime. A包含描述信息和正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达的远程处理分支的信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何封送对象。The following code example demonstrates how to unmarshal an object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/CPP/client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/CS/client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.Unmarshal#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.Unmarshal/VB/client.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过信道传输到另一个应用程序域 （可能在另一个进程或计算机）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中一次必须对其进行分析以创建代理对象，通常连接到真实对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消封送，进行分析，以提取远程对象和透明的代理的方法信息和创建对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 已分析的内容之前向公共语言运行时注册透明代理添加到透明的代理。The content of the parsed is added to the transparent proxy before the transparent proxy is registered with the common language runtime. A包含描述信息和正封送的对象类，一个 URI，唯一标识的特定对象实例和通信相关的有关如何到达的远程处理分支的信息对象所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 代理时第一次创建，属于类型。When first created, the proxy is of type . 如将其转换为不同类型时，远程处理基础结构将跟踪的最常用的类型，以避免不必要地加载该类型。As you cast it into different types, the remoting infrastructure keeps track of the most used type to avoid loading the type unnecessarily.
